attributes.title: Alien Isolation Pt. 7
attributes.caption: We are bad parents
attributes.description: Kyle and Miles journey back to Sevastopol Station to reconnect with Scoops, Kanye and "Marshal."

attributes.title: Alien Isolation Pt. 8
attributes.caption: Lost in Space
attributes.description: Have you ever been on one of those tilt-a-whirl things at the state fair Yea the beginning of this episode is like that but with a Xenomorph chasing you on it.

attributes.title: Alien Isolation Pt. 9
attributes.caption: Straight Outta Compton
attributes.description: Kyle did his homework and now he and Miles are on the fast track through Sevastopol to find Samuels

attributes.title: Alien Isolation Pt. 10
attributes.caption: Space Whale
attributes.description: Kyle and Miles spend some time reminiscing about Scoops and wonder if they will ever see him again, that and if they will ever make it off this station.

attributes.title: Alien Isolation Pt. 11
attributes.caption: Skittles
attributes.description: Kyle and Miles are in the worse place ever with the most horrid monster ever conceived. It's name is Skittles and it will never ask for consent before jumping down your throat.

attributes.title: Alien Isolation Pt. 12
attributes.caption: PenUltimate Finale!
attributes.description: This is the longest let's play Miles and Kyle have ever done, they have been on this station for what seems like an eternity and now they are so close...

attributes.title: Alien Isolation Pt. 13
attributes.caption: The Actual Finale!
attributes.description: After countless deaths, back stabs, explosions, hoards of Kanye, a malicious A.I. and "one" very smart Alien the end is finally here.

attributes.title: Alien Isolation DLC
attributes.caption: ​One year ago Miles and Kyle introduced themselves to Scoops and what developed was most special “friendship” either of them have ever made with an Alien.
attributes.description: One year ago Miles and Kyle introduced themselves to Scoops and what developed was most special friendship either of them have ever made with an Alien. At the end of their adventure on Sevastopol Station they said they would return and as promised Kyle and Miles are back for some Halloween fun" playing the Alien Isolation DLC: Crew Expendable.
